price: Lakini Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Mola wangu Mlezi. Wala simshirikishi na yeyote.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: Lakini mimi ninasema: Hakika aliye niumba mimi na akaumba ulimwengu wote huu ni Mwenyezi Mungu Mola wangu Mlezi. Na mimi namuabudu Yeye peke yake, wala simshirikishi na yeyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
